Method Detail

getProcessInstances

Set<ProcessInstance> getProcessInstances(List<ProcessInstanceUUID> instanceUUIDs,
                                         Map<String,String> options)
                                         throws RemoteException
Returns all records of instances matching with the given ProcessInstanceUUID.
If one of the ProcessInstanceUUID is not found, nothing is added to the result.
An empty set is returned if no instance is found.

Parameters:
instanceUUIDs - the instance UUIDs.
options - the options map (domain, queryList, user)
Returns:
all records of instances matching with the given ProcessInstanceUUID.
Throws:
RemoteException

getLightProcessInstances

Set<LightProcessInstance> getLightProcessInstances(List<ProcessInstanceUUID> instanceUUIDs,
                                                   Map<String,String> options)
                                                   throws RemoteException
Gets a set of light process instances form their UUIDs.

Parameters:
instanceUUIDs - the collection of instance UUIDs
options - the options map (domain, queryList, user)
Returns:
a set of light process instances form their UUIDs.
Throws:
RemoteException

getLightProcessInstances

List<LightProcessInstance> getLightProcessInstances(List<ProcessInstanceUUID> instanceUUIDs,
                                                    int fromIndex,
                                                    int pageSize,
                                                    Map<String,String> options)
                                                    throws RemoteException
Gets a set of light process instances from an index to the page size according to the collection of process instance UUIDs. This set is a sub-set of getLightProcessInstances.

Parameters:
instanceUUIDs - the instances UUIDs
fromIndex - the index
pageSize - the page size
options - the options map (domain, queryList, user)
Returns:
a set of light process instances
Throws:
RemoteException

getProcessInstancesWithInstanceStates

Set<ProcessInstance> getProcessInstancesWithInstanceStates(List<InstanceState> instanceStates,
                                                           Map<String,String> options)
                                                           throws RemoteException
Returns all records of instances in one of the given states.

Parameters:
instanceStates - a Collection of the required instance states
options - the options map (domain, queryList, user)
Returns:
all records of instances in one task in one of the given states.
Throws:
RemoteException

getProcessInstancesWithTaskState

Set<ProcessInstance> getProcessInstancesWithTaskState(List<ActivityState> activityStates,
                                                      Map<String,String> options)
                                                      throws RemoteException
Returns all records of instances having one task in one of the given states.

Parameters:
activityStates - states
options - the options map (domain, queryList, user)
Returns:
all records of instances having one task in one of the given states.
Throws:
RemoteException

getTaskList

Collection<TaskInstance> getTaskList(ProcessInstanceUUID instanceUUID,
                                     List<ActivityState> taskStates,
                                     Map<String,String> options)
                                     throws InstanceNotFoundException,
                                            RemoteException
Obtains the user tasks depending on the given activity states for the given instance and the authenticated user.

Parameters:
instanceUUID - the instance UUID.
taskStates - the states of the task.
options - the options map (domain, queryList, user)
Returns:
a collection of task records. If no tasks are found, an empty collection is returned.
Throws:
InstanceNotFoundException
RemoteException
